availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Theodore W. Bledsoe (Illinois and Mason County attorney)

body.p: Illinois and Mason County attorney. Kentucky native. Married Mary F. Elliott Bledsoe in 1862.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, District 1, p. 25. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Illinois, Edgar County, Paris, p. 12. Jordan Dodd and Liahona Research, comp.. Illinois, Marriages, 1851-1900, Ancestry, January 2, 1862. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, Minerva, District 4, p. 15. Birth and Death Records: Covington, Lexington, Louisville, and Newport â€“ Microfilm (before 1911), Ancestry, Covington, Deaths, 1908.
